title: I feel alone on this one...
body: I prefer ARAM over Normals or ranked. Just mainly because there's less rage in ARAM  gamemodes and i like to get into the game fast not having to care as much about CS.  I play the occasional norms, but i have around 350 ARAM wins whereas i have 250 Normal wins.. Just my opinion though ahahaha {{champion:32}}

replies.body: You're not alone. Across all my accounts I reckon I have over 500 ARAMs played and about 300 across all other queues (including featured game modes).
I have to agree with you on this one through my experiences with normals and ranked games, not really pleasant at times from rage, the toxicity of some players, etc.
This is pretty much all I play I played some games to get ranked in silver then just played aram all season. I personally want a ranked version of aram, but no you are not alone.
I used to prefer ARAM as I was learning the game.
ARAM is fun on occasion, but if you are an avid ARAM player you are probably in general, a bad player.
